attributes.action:
KENDAL NEEDS a NORTHERN INDUSTRIAL ROUTE ! 
Junction 36 M6-A591-A6 a.s.a.p !
attributes.additional_details: * Ensure that when the M6 is closed between Junction 36 & 39 diverted traffic is not reliant on single-lane bridges in Kendal thus Gridlocking the Town therefore improving the resilience of the M6 corridor in the surrounding Kendal Areas when there is a Major Closure of the M6 North & South between Junction 36 Kendal & 39 Shap
attributes.background:
* To support the delivery of the future strategic growth of the Town.
* Reduce congestion and increase the resilience within the Town Centre.
* Improve resilience and accessibility to existing Industrial , Shopping & Employment Areas.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
